title: ECP enforces transfer, posting ban on officers in NA-18 constituency
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 08 (APP):The Election Commission of Pakistan (ECP) on Wednesday imposed a ban on the posting and transfer of government officers within Haripur district, aiming to ensure free, fair, and transparent by-elections in NA-18 (Haripur), Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.
According to the notification, the ban will remain in force until the official publication of the names of returned candidates.
Additionally, the ECP has barred government officials and elected representatives — including those from local bodies — from announcing development schemes in constituencies undergoing by-elections, effective until November 23, 2025.
